PROJECT_NOTEBOOK.description: The Notebook Tab, where the user can take it's own notes

NOTEBOOK_SELECT_IMAGE_ERROR.description: Notification error that shows up when the user didn't choose an image to load

NOTEBOOK_SELECT_FILE_ERROR.description: Notification error that shows up when the user didn't choose a file to load

NOTEBOOK_DELETE_ITEM_QUESTION.message: Are you sure you want to delete this element?
NOTEBOOK_DELETE_ITEM_QUESTION.description: Confirmation prompt which ensures that the user really wants to delete the current notebook element

NOTEBOOK_DELETE_ITEM_TITLE.description: Title of the delete confirmation prompt

NOTEBOOK_LOAD_DATA_ERROR.message: Unable to load the notebook data ({error})
NOTEBOOK_LOAD_DATA_ERROR.description: This error shwos up when notebook.json can't be parsed.

NOTEBOOK_RESET_NOTEBOOK_TITLE.description: Title of the reset confirmation prompt

NOTEBOOK_RESET_NOTEBOOK_QUESTION.message:
Are you sure you want to reset the notebook?
You will lose all the notes for this project.
NOTEBOOK_RESET_NOTEBOOK_QUESTION.description: Confirmation prompt which ensures that the user really wants to reset the notebook

NOTEBOOK_LOAD_PROJECT.message: Load a project to display the notebook
NOTEBOOK_LOAD_PROJECT.description: The message when there is no project loaded
